jobs.title: Python/AI/ML/Data Science Developer
jobs.description: Job Description of a Python Fullstack Developer  Python developer designs, develops, and maintains software using the Python programming language.  This involves constructing server-side logic, creating reusable code, integrating with front-end components, and implementing security and data protection measures.  They may also work on data storage solutions, performance optimization, and collaborate with other team members.  Key Responsibilities:  Backend Development: Building server-side logic for web applications and other systems.  Code Development: Writing clean, efficient, and well-documented Python code.  Integration : Integrating backend components with front-end interfaces and other systems.  Data Management: Designing and implementing data storage solutions and managing data flow.  Security : Implementing security measures to protect data and systems.  Performance Optimization: Ensuring applications are performant, scalable, and efficient.  Collaboration : Working with other developers, designers, and stakeholders to deliver quality products.  Skills and Technologies:  ProgrammingLanguages : Python (including knowledge of core concepts, OOP principles, and data structures).  Frameworks : Experience with Python web frameworks like Django, Flask, or FastAPI. Databases: Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases.  Cloud Technologies: Experience with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.  Version Control: Proficiency with Git and version control systems. Testing: Experience with unit and integration testing.  Other: Knowledge of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) can be beneficial.  Training:To provide a hands on training on the same to the Junior Developers & Interns

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: Position SummaryWe are looking for a skilled Data Analyst with expertise in NumPy and PyTorch to join ourAdvanced Analytics team in Bengaluru. The role will involve working with high-dimensionalhealthcare datasets to extract insights, build predictive models, and automate decisionmaking pipelines that directly impact Cardinal Health’s operations and clinical decisionmaking.Key Responsibilities• Extract, clean, manipulate, and analyze complex structured and unstructuredhealthcare data using Python libraries such as NumPy, pandas, and PyTorch.• Develop deep learning and machine learning models using PyTorch for applicationslike demand forecasting, patient behavior modeling, and logistics optimization.• Work collaboratively with data scientists, business analysts, clinicians, and softwareengineers to build scalable analytics solutions.• Design, evaluate, and interpret statistical analyses and data science experiments.• Build end-to-end data pipelines and predictive dashboards integrated into businesssystems or external-facing tools.• Implement and fine-tune algorithms for classification, regression, clustering, and timeseries forecasting using PyTorch and NumPy.• Assist in deploying models into production using containerized environments(Docker/Kubernetes preferred) and MLOps pipelines.• Document model assumptions, processes, and validation methods for both technicaland non-technical stakeholders.Required Qualifications• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, DataScience, Engineering, or related quantitative fields.• Minimum 0-3 years of hands-on experience in data analytics or applied machine learning.• Proficiency in Python with advanced knowledge of NumPy for numerical data processing.• Practical experience with PyTorch for deep learning model building and experimentation.• Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming.• Experience in data cleaning, dat...

jobs.title: Tally Faculty
jobs.description:
Job Summary:

We are seeking a knowledgeable and enthusiastic Tally Faculty @ Nungambakkam Tally authorised Training Center to train students in Tally ERP and Tally Prime software, accounting principles, and GST-related processes. The ideal candidate should have both practical experience in using Tally and teaching skills to deliver concepts in a simple, engaging, and structured manner. The role includes conducting training sessions, preparing course content, and evaluating student performance.

The Tally Faculty will play a key role in shaping students' accounting knowledge and software skills, preparing them for jobs in accounting, finance, and taxatio

jobs.title: Tally Support Executive
jobs.description: Job Description: We are hiring Tally Support Executives to assist our clients in the effective use of Tally software for accounting and business operations. This role is ideal for candidates from a commerce background with strong knowledge of accounting principles and hands-on experience in Tally.  Key Responsibilities: Provide remote support to clients for Tally-related queries and accounting processes. Help clients in managing day-to-day accounting activities using Tally. Ensure clients understand how to use Tally effectively as per their business needs. Assist with basic Tally setup and configuration as required. Provide excellent service and ensure the Tally software runs smoothly for clients. Maintain proper records of support provided and feedback received.   Eligibility Criteria: Education: B.Com, BAF, Commerce Background Candidate Only. Experience: Freshers to 6 months of experience. Age: 20 to 26 years. Skills: Strong Tally and Account Knowledge. Good communication and problem-solving skills.    Compensation: Salary: 14,000 to 18,000 per month
